name: [Bio-Syntax]
description:
The term “Bio-Syntax” is a combination between the expression biosynthesis that studies the catalytic processes of enzymes carried out by living beings or in vitro and the term syntax, which is a linguistic technique that determines the way in which words are ordered and combined , within a speech.

Through the use of generative neural networks, Marto combined the textures, patterns and colors of around 100 3D works made by Asdrúbal Gómez, thus creating a syntactic logic of new itineraries that supposes the genesis of post-biological experiences.
